EFA model https://campus.datacamp.com/courses/factor-analysis-in-r/evaluating-your-measure-with-factor-analysis?ex=1

EFA explained https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/medicine-and-dentistry/exploratory-factor-analysis

EFA explained https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ollp2nSQCLY 
```{r}

library(psych)

#Making all -1 to NA's
#Physician[Physician == -1] <- NA

#EFA for other fatigue
EFA_model <- fa(Physician[322:334]) #mangler gastofistularectumM3 kollonne 82
fa.diagram(EFA_model)
EFA_model$loadings

plot(density(EFA_model$scores, na.rm = TRUE), 
    main = "Factor Scores")


#EFA for physician symptoms
EFA_model <- fa(Physician[,c(2,18,34,50,66,98,114,130,146,162,178,194,210,226,242,258,274,290,306,322,338)]) #mangler gastofistularectumM3 kollonne 82
fa.diagram(EFA_model)
EFA_model$loadings

plot(density(EFA_model$scores, na.rm = TRUE), 
    main = "Factor Scores")
```
